title: File Input/Output
description:
Practice string manipulation for file path operations.

Steps:
1. Implement `get_file_extension` so `get_file_extension('document.txt')` returns ".txt"; `get_file_extension('script.rb')` returns ".rb".
2. Implement `get_filename_without_extension` so `get_filename_without_extension('document.txt')` returns "document"; `get_filename_without_extension('script.rb')` returns "script".
3. Implement `create_backup_name` so `create_backup_name('data.txt')` returns "data.bak.txt"; `create_backup_name('code.rb')` returns "code.bak.rb".

Expected results:
- `get_file_extension('document.txt')` returns ".txt"
- `get_file_extension('script.rb')` returns ".rb"
- `get_filename_without_extension('document.txt')` returns "document"
- `get_filename_without_extension('script.rb')` returns "script"
- `create_backup_name('data.txt')` returns "data.bak.txt"
- `create_backup_name('code.rb')` returns "code.bak.rb"
starterCode:
